Write a summary about 'nutrition'. Limit the output to 50 words. 'Nutrition' encompasses the intake and utilization of nutrients, essential for growth, maintenance, and health. It involves consuming appropriate amounts of proteins, carbohydrates, fats, vitamins, and minerals, balancing energy expenditure to prevent obesity and deficiency diseases. Good nutrition promotes overall health, helping to prevent chronic diseases like diabetes and heart disease.

Nutrition is crucial for our bodies to function properly. It involves eating the right foods in the right amounts. This includes proteins, which help build and repair tissues; carbohydrates, our body's main energy source; healthy fats, which support brain function and nutrient absorption; and vitamins and minerals, which help various body processes. Eating too much or too little can lead to health issues like obesity and malnutrition. Balancing food intake with physical activity is key to maintaining a healthy weight and preventing chronic diseases.
